DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy new ophthalmic formulation bimatoprost patient open angle glaucoma ocular hypertension . At least 3 formulation evaluate base internal data review cohort . The study conduct 2 stage . Stage 1 open-label Stage 2 mask .
